body:
Day 20 - 456*
The characters had no defining feature most of the time, in some panels I thought that the girl was the guy and the guy was the girl. Also, it seems like to the actual hentai pages, the author made them faster than the other not really caring about any details. Overall seems like the author wanted to do a romance manga and not hentai.
1/10.
Who is here from the Squid Game?
Aaaand even more Shana ones, how surprising 5/10

f you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't underestimate random people curse
